name: Douglas Hurley
bio: Douglas Gerald Hurley is an American engineer, former Marine Corps pilot and former NASA astronaut. He launched into space for thierd time as commander of Crew Dragon Demo-2

name: Mark Shuttleworth
bio: Mark Richard Shuttleworth is the founder of Canonical... former Marine Corps pilot and former NASA astronaut. He launched into space for thierd time as commander of Crew Dragon Demo-2

name: Victor Glover
bio: Pilot on the first operational flight of the SpaceX...former Marine Corps pilot and former NASA astronaut. He launched into space for thierd time as commander of Crew Dragon Demo-2

name: Anousheh Ansari
bio: Anousheh Ansari is an Iranian American engineer...former Marine Corps pilot and former NASA astronaut. He launched into space for thierd time as commander of Crew Dragon Demo-2
